article:
Scott Heiferman and Brendan McGovern founded  Meetup in 2002. The two met by _ incollege and became good friends. That chance meeting led to the creation of Meetup and is _ the founders stress the value of connecting with strangers.
Meetup is a community-building app that _ people in a common place. Members can join a group that interests them online and then meet them in person. Today's world depends more on technology than _ , human contact to communicate. But Meetup allows members to "use the Internet to get _ the Internet" and have face-to-face meetings.
To sign up and attend any Meet up is _ . There is only a fee for organizing and keeping groups. The selection of groups to choose from is large. A Meetup group exists  for _ any shared interest: sports, cooking, language, art, pets and every hobby under the sun. There are also parenting groups and cultural groups. I have personally used Meetup to meet other _ lovers to go riding and climbing.
The app _ as a great way to network with others. More chances can come from meeting with _ . Who knows? It is very possible to meet a new best friend or business partner at the next Meetup.
